price: Huwaoni wale waliopewa sehemu ya Kitabu wananunua upotovu na wanakutakeni nanyi mupotee Njia?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ نَصِيبٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ يَشۡتَرُونَ ٱلضَّلَٰلَةَ وَيُرِيدُونَ أَن تَضِلُّواْ ٱلسَّبِيلَ
footnotes: Hebu huyastaajabii mambo ya hawa walio pewa sehemu ya Vitabu vilivyo tangulia wanavyo acha uwongofu na wakatafuta upotovu katika mambo yaliyo wakhusu nafsi zao! Na wao tena wanakutakeni nyinyi mjitenge na Haki ambayo ndiyo Njia ya Mwenyezi Mungu Iliyo Nyooka!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā alladhīna ūtū naṣīban mina al-kitābi yashtarūna al-ḍalālata wayurīdūna an taḍillū al-sabīla
